text: Hi kids!
Guess who's here!
Yes its me Bob...
Join me for learning street with Bob
“Hello Kids! I am Bob the Train, your DJ & Host. Welcome to our phonics show
“Our participants in this show are the letters of the alphabet.
Isn’t that cool? They will sing, dance and teach us sounds that start with the letters.
. Now, let’s say a big hello and welcome to our wonderful judges”
Are you ready, judges?
Yes Bob!

She’s cool; she’s crazy.
She’s Ms. C. She’s Ms. C

She’s cool; she’s crazy.
She’s Ms. C. She’s Ms. C

The ca-ca sound is my jam
The ca-ca sound is what I am.
Ca ca ca Ca ca ca
Ca ca ca Ca ca ca

Nothing looks better in a hat…
Than a cute cuddly cat

Ca-Ca… cat
Ca-Ca… cat

Let’s say a big WOW 
To this mooing Cow

Ca-Ca… cow
Ca-Ca… cow

You know what’s yummier on a pan…?
Some red beans in a can.

Ca-Ca… can
Ca-Ca… can

I would surely love to bake…
A nice big piece of cake

Ca-Ca… cake
Ca-Ca… cake

You can drive near and far
If you’re sitting in a car
Ca-ca… car Ca-ca… car

Hey Mr. Parrot…
Stop trying to eat that carrot
Ca-ca… carrot Ca-ca… carrot
And I thought only rabbits liked carrots

Look, there’s my favourite mammal
Hi there Mr. camel
Ca-ca… camel Ca-ca… camel

What’s this on stage?
It looks like a big cage.
Ca-ca… cage Ca-ca… cage
A button you can flick to get your camera to click
Ca-ca… camera Ca-ca… camera

You know what I love more than mustard
A big fat bowl of custard
Ca-ca… custard Ca-ca… custard

The ca-ca sound is my jam
The ca-ca sound is hat I am.
Ca ca ca Ca ca ca
Miss. C you are cooler than the coolest. Judges, can we have the scores!
captivating! carefree! creative! Cool! Charming!
Thank you, Miss C and you charming judges.
We will be back soon with the sweet sound of other letters of the alphabet.
Till then Ciao.
Hey kids!
Watch the video again and count the number of words
That start with the letter of the alphabet in this episode
Don't forget to put your answers in the comment section below
Thank You!
